Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy with enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant that looks unhealthy due to a lack of water.
The student can draw a plant that looks unhealthy due to a lack of light.
The student can show the difference between plants with and without water in their drawings.
The student can show the difference between plants with and without light in their drawings.
The student can use drawings to illustrate that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
